item.title: [sld] Fractured Identity
item.description:
Sorcery

Exile target nonland permanent. Each player other than its controller creates a token that's a copy of it.

item.title: [sld] Fire Covenant
item.description:
Instant

As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay X life.

Fire Covenant deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures.

item.title: [sld] Drown in the Loch
item.description:
Instant

Choose one —

• Counter target spell with mana value less than or equal to the number of cards in its controller's graveyard.

• Destroy target creature with mana value less than or equal to the number of cards in its controller's graveyard.

item.title: [sld] Fracturing Gust
item.description:
Instant

Destroy all artifacts and enchantments. You gain 2 life for each permanent destroyed this way.

item.title: [sld] Artifact Mutation
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target artifact. It can't be regenerated. Create X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens, where X is that artifact's mana value.

item.title: [sld] Gamble
item.description:
Sorcery

Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, discard a card at random, then shuffle.

item.title: [sld] Wrath of God
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

item.title: [sld] Preordain
item.description:
Sorcery

Scry 2, then draw a card. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

item.title: [sld] Decree of Pain
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated. Draw a card for each creature destroyed this way.

Cycling {3}{B}{B} ({3}{B}{B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

When you cycle Decree of Pain, all creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.

item.title: [sld] Nature's Lore
item.description:
Sorcery

Search your library for a Forest card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

item.title: [c21] Ambition's Cost
item.description:
Sorcery

You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.

item.title: [c21] Ancient Craving
item.description:
Sorcery

You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.

item.title: [c21] Deadly Tempest
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy all creatures. Each player loses life equal to the number of creatures they controlled that were destroyed this way.

item.title: [c21] Damnable Pact
item.description:
Sorcery

Target player draws X cards and loses X life.

item.title: [c21] Bloodtracker
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Wizard

Flying

{B}, Pay 2 life: Put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodtracker.

When Bloodtracker leaves the battlefield, draw a card for each +1/+1 counter on it.

item.title: [c21] Bloodthirsty Aerialist
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Rogue

Flying

Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodthirsty Aerialist.

item.title: [c21] Greed
item.description:
Enchantment

{B}, Pay 2 life: Draw a card.

item.title: [c21] Feed the Swarm
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy target creature or enchantment an opponent controls. You lose life equal to that permanent's converted mana cost.

item.title: [c21] Epicure of Blood
item.description:
Creature — Vampire

Whenever you gain life, each opponent loses 1 life.

item.title: [c21] Defiant Bloodlord
item.description:
Creature — Vampire

Flying

Whenever you gain life, target opponent loses that much life.

item.title: [c21] Ob Nixilis Reignited
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Nixilis

+1: You draw a card and you lose 1 life.

−3: Destroy target creature.

−8: Target opponent gets an emblem with "Whenever a player draws a card, you lose 2 life."

item.title: [c21] Noxious Gearhulk
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Construct

Menace

When Noxious Gearhulk enters the battlefield, you may destroy another target creature. If a creature is destroyed this way, you gain life equal to its toughness.

item.title: [c21] Sanguine Bond
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever you gain life, target opponent loses that much life.

item.title: [c21] Sangromancer
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Shaman

Flying

Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, you may gain 3 life.

Whenever an opponent discards a card, you may gain 3 life.

item.title: [c21] Reckless Spite
item.description:
Instant

Destroy two target nonblack creatures. You lose 5 life.

item.title: [c21] Vampire Nighthawk
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Shaman

Flying, deathtouch, lifelink

item.title: [c21] Taste of Death
item.description:
Sorcery

Each player sacrifices three creatures. You create three Food tokens. (They're artifacts with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")

item.title: [c21] Suffer the Past
item.description:
Instant

Exile X target cards from target player's graveyard. For each card exiled this way, that player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

item.title: [c21] Silversmote Ghoul
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Vampire

At the beginning of your end step, if you gained 3 or more life this turn, return Silversmote Ghoul from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

{1}{B}, Sacrifice Silversmote Ghoul: Draw a card.

item.title: [c21] Gift of Paradise
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant land

When Gift of Paradise enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

Enchanted land has "{T}: Add two mana of any one color."

item.title: [c21] Cultivate
item.description:
Sorcery

Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, and put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

item.title: [c21] Ageless Entity
item.description:
Creature — Elemental

Whenever you gain life, put that many +1/+1 counters on Ageless Entity.

item.title: [c21] Verdant Sun's Avatar
item.description:
Creature — Dinosaur Avatar

Whenever Verdant Sun's Avatar or another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain life equal to that creature's toughness.

item.title: [c21] Rampant Growth
item.description:
Sorcery

Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

item.title: [c21] Pulse of Murasa
item.description:
Instant

Return target creature or land card from a graveyard to its owner's hand. You gain 6 life.

item.title: [c21] Nissa's Renewal
item.description:
Sorcery

Search your library for up to three basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library. You gain 7 life.

item.title: [c21] Gaze of Granite
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy each nonland permanent with converted mana cost X or less.

item.title: [c21] Moldervine Reclamation
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever a creature you control dies, you gain 1 life and draw a card.

item.title: [c21] Leyline Prowler
item.description:
Creature — Nightmare Beast

Deathtouch, lifelink

{T}: Add one mana of any color.

item.title: [c21] Gluttonous Troll
item.description:
Creature — Troll

Trample

When Gluttonous Troll enters the battlefield, create a number of Food tokens equal to the number of opponents you have. (Food tokens are artifacts with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")

{1}{G}, Sacrifice another nonland permanent: Gluttonous Troll gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

item.title: [c21] Sapling of Colfenor
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Treefolk Shaman

Indestructible

Whenever Sapling of Colfenor attacks, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, you gain life equal to that card's toughness, lose life equal to its power, then put it into your hand.

item.title: [c21] Alhammarret's Archive
item.description:
Legendary Artifact

If you would gain life, you gain twice that much life instead.

If you would draw a card except the first one you draw in each of your draw steps, draw two cards instead.

item.title: [c21] Paradise Plume
item.description:
Artifact

As Paradise Plume enters the battlefield, choose a color.

Whenever a player casts a spell of the chosen color, you may gain 1 life.

{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.

item.title: [c21] Loxodon Warhammer
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +3/+0 and has trample and lifelink.

Equip {3}

item.title: [c21] Elixir of Immortality
item.description:
Artifact

{2}, {T}: You gain 5 life. Shuffle Elixir of Immortality and your graveyard into their owner's library.

item.title: [c21] Druidic Satchel
item.description:
Artifact

{2}, {T}: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token. If it's a land card, put that card onto the battlefield under your control. If it's a noncreature, nonland card, you gain 2 life.

item.title: [c21] Venser's Journal
item.description:
Artifact

You have no maximum hand size.

At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain 1 life for each card in your hand.

item.title: [c21] Talisman of Resilience
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add {C}.

{T}: Add {B} or {G}. Talisman of Resilience deals 1 damage to you.

item.title: [c21] Sun Droplet
item.description:
Artifact

Whenever you're dealt damage, put that many charge counters on Sun Droplet.

At the beginning of each upkeep, you may remove a charge counter from Sun Droplet. If you do, you gain 1 life.

item.title: [c21] Pristine Talisman
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add {C}. You gain 1 life.
